website_summaries.verdict: This castor oil has the features most users are looking for in the product – cold-pressed, pure oil that produces noticeable results in a USDA organic formula.
pros: This pure castor oil catches our attention for its cold-pressed, cruelty-free formula
We love that it is USDA certified organic
Delivers noticeably moisturized skin and thicker hair for most users
cons: Feels slightly sticky, and the consistency is on the thick side
Not all users like the scent

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend to do this overnight.
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergy in my scalp last 10 months ago that made the back of my head bald. I was really desperate to try some hair growing product to bring my hair back. I read most of the articles in google and found out castor oil is one of the greatest products for hair growing but there are lots of castor oil brand. I tried this product because of the good reviews, and ingredients because my scalp was really sensitive. And I didn’t expect the outcome of this product. Check the photos below! And aside from the outcome, my hair became softer than before and thicker, and 1 bottle of this castor oil lasted almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Castor + jojoba + peppermint oils = miracle!
customer_reviews.text: The combination of these 3 oils was recommended by sky organics for dealing with hair thinning, hair loss and improving growth. I used this for my super neglected, post pregnancy thinning hair. There is a loud and clear difference in 3 months. You won't need to measure your growth; it's that obvious! The quality and quantity of my hair has improved dramatically 😊 Castor oil by itself is very thick and tricky to use as is on hair. Adding 1 part jojoba to 2 parts castor helps thin it out, and makes it much easier to apply and clean off. Just try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Knomad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Ethnic Hair!
customer_reviews.text: If you have any type 4 hair, I cannot tell you how much this product will help your scalp and hair! Castor oil is super thick and sticky, and works miracles on black hair. My daughters' hair and scalp are much more manageable and healthy since I started using this on a regular basis!
customer_reviews.author: tmcs

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Love it ! Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! It’s a little hard to wash off but that’s okay ! I just had a baby and my hair started to fall off ! It became so thin and I was getting bald spots ! In just five days I have a big difference !! It even slowed down the hair loss ! Will definitely buy another bottle when this one is done ! #MiracleWorker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing after one week I can really see a difference with my eye lashes
customer_reviews.author: Ryss Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I found castor oil with a great reviews and I decided to give a shot to ...
customer_reviews.text: After having a baby I lost my hair tremendously, plus trying to get a volume to my hair I did perms and it damaged it the roots of my hair. So after loosing so much hair I got horrified seeing bold scalp on my forehead!😟 I decided to search products in Amazon. After reviewing a lot of products, I found castor oil with a great reviews and I decided to give a shot to it ! I was amazed that this oil works with no doubt! Love it 😍 love it !!! See my results in the pictures, you will be surprised 👍😍! It’s been 4-5 weeks only and grew so much !
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The one I received is not cold pressed as advertised and like it says in the pictures. Mine just says expeller pressed which I’ve read is not exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Nodell

customer_reviews.title: Made My Hair Fall Out!! Please Dont Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I beg of you, please don’t buy this product. I had never used it before but saw all the raving reviews about it and decided to give it a shot for my thinning hair. The “solution” ended up being my biggest curse and made my hair fall out in clumps. Please, don’t buy this. I’m trying to spare you the tears and dissappointment. Buy anything else but this. They’re deleting negative reviews so I’m not sure how long this will be up, but if you see this, PLEASE CLICK AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: haven't noticed any benefits to hair, and applying it is a pain. Had it as a subscription but no longer want anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabato

customer_reviews.title: Real and immediate results!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I chopped my hair off a while ago and was worried because it wasn’t growing whatsoever. I did my searching a found this and decided to try it out... almost 2 weeks in and I can already tell I have one inch down! Super happy with these results and my hair feels way softer now. I’m also using this on my eyelashes and I have way more lashes than I did before. No more lower lash bald spots that’s for sure. This stuff is amazing I love it, can’t forget to put this stuff on every night before I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Peyronie's syndrome/disease
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item for the use of "Peyronie's syndrome/disease" that we just found out my husband has. Many blogs were 50/50 about the effectiveness of using Castor oil, until I read about using a high quality, organic Castor oil, then i couldn't find one person with a complaint. From what I can tell, this is a high quality product, there is NO smell (like I have experienced with the drug store bought one's) and it absorbed into the skin quite quickly. I was very pleased and surprise at the quality of this product, I think I will even start using it on my stretch marks. I will definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for skin & hair!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product that gives amazing results. I use it head to toe at bedtime. Tip: If you are a contact wearer and use it on your eyelashes at night, wipe your lashes with makeup remover (on a cotton ball) prior to putting your contacts in the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Christi J.

customer_reviews.title: I have small bald spot in my hair. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have small bald spot in my hair. I used this product for a month almost using it every day. However, no effect on my bald spot. I will go with the JBCO i hope that will work.
customer_reviews.author: FN NS

customer_reviews.title: I have used this on my scalp under my wigs ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on my scalp under my wigs for the past 6 months and my hair has grew so much
customer_reviews.author: Shaolin K

customer_reviews.title: Rash Outbreak!!!!
customer_reviews.text: IMPORTANT: If you have sensitive skin (like me) DO NOT APPLY THIS TO YOUR LASHES!!!! People with sensitive skin will break out in a bright red rash that will make you look like you have pink eye. I had used this twice on my eyelashes and on my eyebrows hoping that this oil would grow and thicken the hairs (like it claims) but I didn't read enough reviews until after the fact. once my waterline and eyelid were bright red and swollen I did more research on castor oil and found that MANY people are allergic to this product!!!! Do your research before you buy this to make sure you won't break out into a rash like me.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I lost so much of my hair
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this product check the bottom for discontinue use after excessive hair loss.... I bought it to regrow and stop my hair breakage, i rather loss a great amount of hair...got me to tears
customer_reviews.author: Harriet O

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is just superb ! The hair growth is super fast and noticable. Picture taken a month apart.
customer_reviews.author: Richa Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love castor oil for hair, skin and dry eyes. I have bought every product OTC for severe dry eyes and none of them worked. A drop of this castor oil in each eye once at bedtime has made my eyes feel normal again, my vision has improved and no more discomfort with redness, itching and dryness. Until now I have suffered for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Everyday lifesaver! Beauty secret revealed....
customer_reviews.text: This oil is housed in a firm container. The oil itself is thick and crystal clear. I use a drop in my bath water every night and as I exit each bath, I dribble a tiny dime-sized drop onto a warm wash cloth and smooth over my entire body to seal in moisture. I also add a drop to my liquid makeup each morning to create an all day, non- greasy sheen. Before leaving the house, I mix a drop of castor oil with my hand lotion and my hands remain smooth and moisturized throughout the day. And so much more... This is an excellent brand and yes, I've tried many !
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a month and a half. Unfortunately, it did not affect me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to help my lashes grow back after using a lash "enhancing" serum that caused them to all fall out. My lashes grew back very quickly once I began using this product. I haven't experienced the significant lash growth that most other reviewers have, but my lashes did return to their normal length after a couple weeks of use. I've also been using this on my skin every night, which is where I have experienced the most benefit. I apply a thin layer on my forehead, eye area, lips, and chin. It has made my skin soft, smooth, and my complexion brighter. I am totally a believer in castor oil as an effective beauty product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Walz

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have always used astor oil for my eyelashes and eyebrows. I used many brands before but I love this one, from one use I could tell the difference. I was unable to use the other brands pn my scalp because it takes forever to come off my hair, and my hair stays greasy for few days. I have used this once on my scalp and the next morning washed it with my regular shampoo and you have no idea how my hair looks like. Didnt have a problem washing it off, my hair looks amazing.now i can apply it on my scalp since it help alot with hair grow. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Haneen Yahya

customer_reviews.title: Works better than Jamaican Black castor Oil !
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I had to buy this to try it out myself. I use to always get Jamaican Black castor Oil but I have seen so much more improvement in my hair. I made a mix with the castor oil and olive oil to put in my hair (4b/4c) and have noticed over an Inch difference in 3 months.— the average person hair grows. 1/4in per a month—- I also used the castor oil on my lashes and noticed they appear longer, shiner and healthier. Definitely would be buying more of this stuff soon. Also to mention, I didn’t use the oil every single day because sometimes I forgot and I still noticed the change !!
customer_reviews.author: Ke

customer_reviews.title: To thick to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is thick as honey and can’t rub this oil in my skin...or use on my lashes,it burns my eyes.A total waist of money for me. I called the company but said to email them...???
customer_reviews.author: Foxyredhead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used 2-3x per day on a cyst near my tailbone - helped clear it up when nothing else would.
customer_reviews.author: preciousROY

customer_reviews.title: The lies they tell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for hair growth and lash growth. It doesn't work. Those who say with in a week they saw growth in their lashes must have been using something else. Im disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Latoiya Green

customer_reviews.title: ... stuff is a miracle it's cleared up my psoriasis love love love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle it's cleared up my psoriasis love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Margie Teranen

customer_reviews.title: But I think it did a pretty good job on my eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have been using this oil on my eyelashes for the past 2 weeks. I haven't had the chance to use it on my hair yet as I am still trying to finish up my previous castor oil from another brand. But I think it did a pretty good job on my eyelashes. At first I thought it didn't make my eyelashes longer, instead made it shorter. But I waited, gave it time. And after 14 days I see results. Well it didn't make my eyelashes longer as yet but I definitely see volume. I will keep using it everyday and give you guys more updates.
customer_reviews.author: Noor

customer_reviews.title: Great Castor Oil For Body And Hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this castor oil for my body (especially for these man feet of mine...lol) and my hair. It's really good oil. One technique to applying this oil (as some may complain that it's too thick), run warm water over your hands leaving them moist, then place some of the oil in your hands and rub your hands together first, THEN, apply to body. Some people who aren't use to the application are just slapping it on without evenly spreading the oil out. I do this without the water technique and apply to my body just fine. I usually do the water technique for hair. Good stuff, try it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Umm...
customer_reviews.text: I was urged by email about 30 minutes after this was placed at my door to rate it. So I'm going to rate it now and again when I actually have evidence it works... I bought this because I have hypothyroidism and my hair is very thin, most of my eyebrows gone, my lashes very brittle and sparse now. My stylist swears by it and uses it herself for her eyebrows. So, it's oily, no strong smell, that's about it right now. I'll be back...
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A.

customer_reviews.title: It shouldn't be taken as a laxative as description said!
customer_reviews.text: My main purpose of purchasing this product was using as a laxative. I checked its description and purchased. After I opened and tried for my skin, I found that "this product should not be taken as a laxative since the bottle does not have drug facts with FDA mandated directions and warnings. It is not healthy for some people to take laxatives, and the company should not be promoting this as a laxative on this website. " Now they deleted "laxative" use from its description.
customer_reviews.author: John Coley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product, I've already made a second purchase in less than a month. I suffer from severe psoriasis and what a difference this has made! Amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A

customer_reviews.title: When nothing works you have “Sky Organics”
customer_reviews.text: This product is magic the first picture is from December and the second one recent from May. There is huge difference in how my hair looks and how quickly it has grown. Do not hesitate to buy this product. I have thyroid due to which my hair was thinning and it was brittle the length would stay the same I had tried all possible hair shampoos and oil and everything nothing like this specific castor oil this one was my second bottle I got one for my mom and she sees a difference too it’s awesome when nothing works you have “Sky Organics”.
customer_reviews.author: Reshma Jung

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to promote hair growth because all the reviews raved about helping it. After a month, and a half I haven’t noticed any difference in my hair, even regarding healthiness. Maybe I’m not doing it enough, or using it right? Who knows. However, I did learn that it’s GREAT for skin. I recently moved from a very humid, wet state, to a very dry one, and this has helped so much with that. I didn’t even expect it. I’ve tried so many lotions, and creams, and this has done wonders compared to those. So, for hair, I’m not that impressed, but skin definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Moore

customer_reviews.title: My hair is growing like crazy. It's thick and has a slight smell
customer_reviews.text: I had an itchy scalp, and thought I'd never find something to get rid of it. It stopped after the first use. Maybe because it's organic? I slather this on, put a plastic cap on, leave it on for 2-3 hours, put a conditioner on top of it (on my hair, not my scalp), leave on additional 10 minutes, then rinse. My hair is growing like crazy. It's thick and has a slight smell, but I'll use it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews and the amount of reviews and I’m not disappointed I did with this product
customer_reviews.text: Oh my I always go by reviews and the amount of reviews and I’m not disappointed I did with this product, I literally used it last night around 6 and woke up this morning with 1 inch baby hairs in the spot I was going bold on, I’ll update in a month and will let you guys see my progress I’m sad I didn’t take a before pic but I’ll take one today and a month from now so you can see the difference so excited 😆but in the pic I posted you can’t see the open pores but trust me they are there 🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought it and hate returning things, I think it’ll just be used for my body. I used it for my hair once and I started seeing more shedding than before. It scared the crap out of me so I will no longer be using it for my hair. Read the bottom of the labels, discontinue if excessive hair loss, I’m tying to grow my hair not lose the little bit I have.
customer_reviews.author: Laneikwa Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product as soon as I received it. My eyelashes and brows are already improving. It is do easy to use. When you put it on, it is a little globby but that's o.k., it is fine that way. I put it on about 15 minutes before I go to bed and it is dry by the time I am ready for sleep. It doesn't get in my eyes at all. In the morning, I just wipe my lashes and brows with a cleansing cloth and use a lash comb. Perfect. I bought this product after doing some research. It had the most positive reviews so I decided to give it s try. I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with long term results
customer_reviews.text: Did the treatment 2-3 times a week for a month and I lost more hair as time went on and lost more length. With all the other reviews I had high hopes and the first couple times my hair looked nicer but long term wasn’t as kind.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Amaxing purity quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this product...my husband has had nail fungus for years even the prescribed medication only clears or for a bit and the pain is still thete...Weve tried Vicks, and the vinegar water works the best but it's a daily routine of soaking everynight,plus does nothing for the pain. after using the organic castor oil last evening without even soaking..The pain has eased quite a bit. my skin is softer and my hair feels awesome... thank you so much...i can feel and smell how pure this product is... Sincerley, Lindy
customer_reviews.author: LindyP

customer_reviews.title: Does amazing things
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil either everyday or every other day on my hair, eyebrows, and lashes and I see good results! My lashes look a little bit longer and my hair is growing out fast. (I just recently cut my hair super short) I use this oil combined with lavender to boost hair growth and just the oil itself for my lashes. I love how the owner reaches out to you with an email with a guide about oils! Super helpful if you're learning about the different oils out there. Definitely would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Gave me hundreds of acne and loss thousand of hairs in a day
customer_reviews.text: If only I could rate negative 1 on it. I got 100 acne in my scalp after using it for the first time. Now it's so painful and I got thousand of hair stands falling in just one day. I thought i'm gonna get bald. I initially bought it because im having post partum hairloss. But my problem doubled.. huhuhu.. I seldom write review here and all are positive but this one is so worthy of my negative review
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: I am using this oil for multiple purposes and I have seen its good results quickly. In my hair I have noticed that it is stronger, it falls less, and its appearance is healthier. On my lips, it leaves them soft and hydrated. The skin of my feet is very soft and in the scar of a recent surgery I see how the oil has given it softness and elasticity, preventing it from getting thick.
customer_reviews.author: llesmes

customer_reviews.title: Old time health and beauty secret
customer_reviews.text: My mother told me she used castor oil on me through out my childhood, she said as a toddler she lightly rubbed me down in it for dry skin and a pinch of it into my hair. 30 years later I purchased this and I'm so glad I did! My hair is growing back from where I've fried it with dyes and other chemicals​, my skin looks better and my skin isn't dry and itchy anymore. I should have purchased a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin and hair care!
customer_reviews.text: I have had good luck with this product so far. I use it for deep conditioning treatments and apply to my eyelashes and eyebrows every night. I have been using it for approximately 2 weeks now and have had great luck. My eyebrows are growing much quicker and my eyelashes are also growing longer. It is also very light compared to other castor oil brands I have used and it does not irritate my skin. My skin is very sensitive to oils and easily breaks out, but this product has not caused this issue thus far so I would say it is good quality if it has not done this to my overly sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: MissJessicaG

customer_reviews.title: Good Oil But Did NOT Promote Eyebrow Growth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try it out on my eyebrows. I used it consistently for weeks and saw no significant eyebrow growth. What growth I did see was minimal. The product is a thick oil and is great for moisture. I use it on my nails and rough dry spots. If you need a thick oil for moisture then buy this product, but I would not recommend for eyebrow growth.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Castor Oil treatment so easy to Appy!!
customer_reviews.text: Found out from my hairdresser that my scalp was extremely dry and I had loss much hair. She suggested Castor Oil treatments. I had my first treatment on Thursday and will donanotjer one today (Monday). I kept thevtreatment on for 7 hours and today will leave on for 4 and I will add peppermint oil to it per your recipe. I couldn’t believe the difference in my hair after treatment. It was shiny and fluffy and so easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL NOT REGRET THIS
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a HUGE difference in my eyelashes and brows within a couple of weeks! don't waste your money on expensive 1oz bottles of castor oil, or some product claiming to be a magical serum. It's just castor oil. And you get a lifetime supply of it with just this bottle. Get this and a mascara applicator and you're DONE. I put it on every night before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: My eyelashes are thicker and longer!
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken a picture of my eyelashes before. I was getting worried about them. Really short and thin. I've only been using this for about 3 weeks and I'm noticing they are longer and thicker. I'm so happy! I also use it in my hair. I'm not noticing a difference yet but I have to think if my lashes and thicker, my hair has to be doing better also. I feel like it gives my hair some texture (good thing!) I've always thought my hair is thin. I'm happy with my purchase and plan on buying again when I run out. It does seem to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE
customer_reviews.text: It caused my husband scalp to blister, even when diluted. They looked like angry pimples all around his scalp. The pimples/blisters would bleed and hurt. This was after the blisters went away. He VERY dry scalp now, after 2 weeks last using. I tried it on my eye brows and it gave me pimples. So it wasn’t just a reaction my husband had.
customer_reviews.author: Emily i

customer_reviews.title: it's not working!
customer_reviews.text: I held high expectation for this product and used it every evening for many month, but see no improvement at where I need it. I thought I was hopeless to be helped till I started to use other products and see improvement right away. Now I know the problem is this product.... and I decided to either dump it or let somebody else to try to see if work on them. Very disappointed and wasted months to try.
customer_reviews.author: logan123

customer_reviews.title: looks fake
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy organic castor oil from the other brand which was really good. Since I wanted to try this one which is also organic and less pricey than the other one, I decided to go with it. However, the organic tag looks fake and there's no non GMO tag. I asked about this before buying but the answer wasn't helpful. This is my one time purchase, would not buy again and I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this castor oil !!! Healed a long standing internal fissure !!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a painful rectal fissure that just wouldn't heal. I decided I would give this a try mixed in with some forces of nature fissure essential oil blend that I bought on Amazon here. OMG after suffering with spasms and pain for several years (medical did not help, just more chemical creams and suppositories that worsened my problem!) this was the cure for me! I continue to apply it daily with the fissure oil and I've been fine for 5 months now, finally it's gone! Keeping it applied daily after movements as a moisturizer and preventative measures to make sure it doesn't come back.
customer_reviews.author: MakeADifference

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I bought it because my hair is thinning because of stress. I tried it for a week in my eye lashes and eye brow and noticed the difference after a while. Then, i started using it to my hair and scalp, after 3 weeks of use I can see baby hair growing and my hair become dark black , thicker and fuller. I will continue using it and buying it in the future form this seller. I will absolutely recommend this to my friends. By the way, i recommended it to my fiance for his dry scalp and it works! Keep up the good work seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff! Great eye makeup remover too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help make my eyelashes and brows thicker, little did I know, it is quite honestly the best waterproof & stubborn eye makeup remover I’ve ever found! An added bonus: My fingernails are stronger since starting to use this as well...I use it at night and rub the extra into my hands. I was expecting a thinner viscosity, this is very thick. It is also clear and completely odorless. It is wonderful on super dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBea

customer_reviews.title: Good for my scalp so far.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used castor oil before but a friend told me that it would improve my scalp dermatitis faster than a steroid cream would so I bought this. I’ve used it twice in the last week, put it on my scalp and hair at night, slept then washed my hair the next day. It appears to be working so far so far because my scalp is less itchy over all and the two spots with red irritated skin haven’t peeled and flaked like usual. Hopefully, it will be lasting results.
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly write reviews but I think this product is worth it! I've been having some stubborn dermatitis on my face for month now and it refused to go away even with the medication my doctor prescribed. I then proceeded to buy this castor oil to see if it would help at least with the dry skin that kept peeling on 4 different spots on my face. I started to use this product twice a day. After showering in the morning before work and after after showering at night before bed. Well, 2 days doing this and dermatitis was GONE! I love it and will not live without it anymore!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Thick. a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great I use it for everything. For my body after I wash. Skin is so smooth and soft for days after! after I wash my face I use a little dap for moisturizer. It doesn't clog my pores and it has cleared up dark spots. I use it in my hair after I wash it. moisture is locked in for days and it is helping my hair grow thicken up and look healthier. I rub it in my nails and my nails are shiny are stronger and longer. This is a miracle Beauty oil I love it
customer_reviews.author: Emma Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Not made for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my curly hair. It does not work well for me and makes my hair look extremely greasy though I only use a small amount. I tried using it on my skin and it makes my skin feel dry... the smell is not nice but also not repulsive.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my life for the better!! I've been using this now for 3+ months and my eyelashes have never been so long and thick. I apply it 3 times a week (sometimes more) with a qtip on the root of my eyelashes before bed and they look amazing. I also use this as a hair mask and I add it to my moisturizer sometimes. The best part is that its still almost full, a little goes a long way. You won't regret this purchase thats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Shipment!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish we could have used these. Received undamaged box with one bottle leaking. On the up side, I didn’t detect a strange order as mentioned in other reviews. Both bottles and the other item in the box (organic cotton flannel) coated in castor oil! So disappointed and really ticked off that I must return for an exchange or refund. Sure hope whoever handles this return has more fun dealing with castor oil everywhere than I did. I understand things happen, I’m disappointed they weren’t just replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner James

customer_reviews.title: works for lash growth
customer_reviews.text: Love this for growing eyelashes! It really really works. I read reviews and was slightly skeptical but wanted to try an all natural product. I was pleasantly surprised to find my lashes growing in about 1-2 weeks. Faster than the expensive lash product I had tried (which took 8-10 weeks to see results). So give this a try. I bought more empty mascara bottles and plan to fill them and give to friends so we all have gorgeous fluttery lashes :)
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: this is a huge bottle of castor oil. same product is sold in tiny 2oz bottles for the same price or more... this is a great value. I recommend getting a smaller application bottle with a smaller hole as the top can get messy! I use this for my eyelashes and as an overnight hair mask. a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the 5th bottle I buy! I use this with organic virgin unrefined coconut oil for my girls skin. They both have eczema and nothing else without steroids works as well. Their pediatrician suggested an over the counter cortisone but it didn't work and didn't want to try the rX steroid cream. This is natural, cost efficient and works very very well for our whole family. I don't buy body lotion anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: good for hair
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with it on my hair twice a wk.. then shampoo.. in morning... I use on eyelashes and brows every night.. I have been doing this for 10 days or so.. I can tell my hair feels better.. brows some. eyelashes not so much yet.. its better if a bit warm.. I have high hopes.. am 67 and have hair loss..
customer_reviews.author: julie williams

customer_reviews.title: It smells so good. Since I've been using this product my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good. Since I've been using this product my hair has grown quite a bit. I had a bald patch from breakage that is now GONE. The has shorter than the rest, so I cut my hair to blend it better. Please get this your hair will thank you. I have also been using it on my eye brows and eye lashes. The brows are getting fuller and the lashes are longer and more defined.
customer_reviews.author: surveyresearch

customer_reviews.title: OUCH! My scalp is burning and itchy
customer_reviews.text: OUCH!!! I applied to my hair Saturday morning and woke up Sunday with my scalp feeling like it was being attacked by fire ants! I scratched my scalp while sleeping until it bled due to the burning itchiness on my scalp. I purchased t gel to stop the itchiness but it is Sunday night and my head feels like it’s gone through a battle with fire. Stick with olive or avocado oil. OUCH. Don’t use if you have sensitive skin, which I do apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: It's what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with strengthening and revitalizing my hair. I haven't used it enough yet to see any difference but it has been making my skin very soft. I put the castor oil into a dropper bottle, such as the ones used for vape juice, for easier application. It is really sticky and thick so I would recommend putting a towel down on your bed if you sleep with it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great castor oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oil, I love the texture and it works great for my hair, my face and for the pain in my shoulder! I have a rotator cuff issue and hurts when I go to sleep at night, I used this oil with a heating pad and it's working wonders for me.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell and not potent
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another brand of Castor oil for a while and really liked it. It did what it needed to do with one tsp. I found that I needed at least 2 T. of this to get half the effect of the other brand. I bought this specifically because it was organic and I thought it might work better and be healthier for my body. I am assuming and that the stronger smell is because it's organic but it Is off putting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for eczema!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product to use for eczema or atopic dermatitis! We’ve gone through every list of natural products and this works for healing the skin and keeping it clear and smooth. My son went through Topical Steriod Withdrawal earlier this year and this was his life saver! He uses it everywhere on his body including face and scalp. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: B Nelson

customer_reviews.title: This really works!! Excellent brand!! Will buy again and again!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Works amazing!! My once over-plucked eyebrows are growing in like crazy!! I have super long eyelashes but use this to keep them healthy and it's made them grow longer and thicker. When I put mascara on it looks like I have false lashes on. I will continue to buy this brand only!! And a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pursell

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it you have nothing to lose and everything to gain
customer_reviews.text: If you're contemplating buying it just do it. I didn't believe it would work so I didn't take pictures, but I was super wrong. In like two weeks of using twice a week I finally had long darkening eyelashes. And I had just trimmed my hair before my wedding so we could easily see about 2in growth after using 2 a week for roughly 5-6 weeks. My hair takes like a year for an inch so I wanted to cry. I just fought a ton of hair loss from a long battle and recovery from a vitamin d deficiency and it feels almost back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am enjoying this product. I use it with my everyday lotion and also on my feet. It works wonders. A very surprising outcome. I highly recommend this product. It’s thicker than lotions but absorbs well into your skin, leaving it feel smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Kirnes

customer_reviews.title: I've used the very expensive Latisse in the past and this works every bit as well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my eyelashes and eyebrows to make them grow longer and it's worked really well! I've used the very expensive Latisse in the past and this works every bit as well. I've discovered that I like to smooth it on my face as an overnight moisturizer as well. It doesn't clog my pores and it's very moisturizing to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: For the past year, I have been using this with rosemary oil to help stimulate hair growth and it actually works! The results haven’t been super dramatic, but I can feel that my hair is thicker and also see A TON of baby hairs growing all the time. It made me realize that the biotin that I had been taking for months, prior to when I started using castor oil, hadn’t been doing anything, so I stopped using/buying them and I haven’t missed them since. This castor oil has been way more effective for me, and more affordable, too!
customer_reviews.author: shenaegrimes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is great I recently purchased it and I'm already loving it i use it on my daughters hair, her hair is kinky and a bit dry I noticed a difference with the first use i applied a generous amount over her hair and I must say it left her hair shiny & soft it's also good to clear hair tangles, it's a must have, the only negative is it has an off putting smell.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Stanley

customer_reviews.title: It Seems To Work
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about six weeks three times a week for hair growth and strengthening. My hair is fine, naturally white and has some areas where there is breakage mostly at the crown of the head. I mix some olive oil in with the castor oil for easier spreadability. I use an eye dropper to apply it onto my scalp, while massaging it in thoroughly. I do this sometimes during the day and leave it in all day; then wash it twice, add some conditioner and rinse at the end of the day. Other times, I’ll apply the oil before bedtime and wash it out in the morning. I am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, but I did notice the other day that the same exact product is sold at Walmart for just over $10.00. May be worth it to swing by there and save a couple dollars. I just started using, so I will continue to watch for hair growth improvements. I did an overnight mask with this oil (applied to scalp and all throughout hair focusing on my ends), did not feel oily (I have curly hair) and left my hair feeling smooth when I washed out the next morning. I currently have crochet locs in my hair, but I have been applying this oil to my scalp every night. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Aberasolomn

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair grow!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for hair masks. Saw immediate improvement in health of hair, much cleaner feeling and added lots of volume. Healthier, thicker and stronger hair. Also used a mascara wand to apply light coat to eyelashes at night - definitely made them grow! Only downside, very viscous and thick so best to mix with another oil (coconut, olive, jojoba, ect) otherwise it’s difficult to spread though hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Growth! | Love the thickness...
customer_reviews.text: PROs: I'm black and have curly hair. I love how thick this oil is as my hair gets really dry. My hair stays moisturized and I don't have to wash it out. The scent of the oil is very faint; not unpleasant. CONs: I've been using this oil daily for almost a month on both my eyebrows and hair and haven't experienced any growth. I do notice a sort of tingling itching sensation when I put it on and according to other reviews they experienced growth after, but I haven't. I will continue using this product as I dont see any harm in doing so. If I notice a change in my hair or brows, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with patience
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. personally my hair doesnt grow as normal and falls like leafs because of thyroid proble, I can still se a HUGE difference. Its a heavy sticky oil and using it overnight its tricky, cause if you use too much you can clog the follicules and it not good, so try to use a Normal amount. 1-2 times per week its more than enough, also you can mix it with tour body cream, 1/10 parts and it way better than coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: C-Fam.

customer_reviews.title: ... I have to say this is by far the best for hair growth and replenishment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried different hair products and supplements and I have to say this is by far the best for hair growth and replenishment. It made my hair grow thicker and fuller as well as bring my hairline forward. I’m impressed that such a simple product works so well. I ended up buying a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want to wear falsies get this
customer_reviews.text: Heaven sent! I used this for 2 weeks on my eyelashes and with mascara it looks like I’m wearing falsies! I get compliments all the time and I wear glasses! I had postpartum hair loss on my edges and within a month, my hair is growing back. It’s worth it! A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Russoink

customer_reviews.title: I was astonished by the result!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 4 months now. First 1 month I haven't noticed anything. Then I suddenly I noticed my hair became thicker than before! Although the oil is very heavy, it gets better if mixed with other carrier oil (e.g. Almond, Olive etc.). It keeps your scalp moisturized as well. Will buy again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Izaz Zunnurain

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product to use for dry skin, severe reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had an allergic reaction to any product or food. I applied this to my legs after my shower in the night, the next morning i had terrible hives all over my legs and where the product was on my skin. Please be careful and test this on your skin. If i knew there was any chance this could happen i would never have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cali girl

customer_reviews.title: I had no eyebrows. I now have some!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really had eyebrows since I was 12. Basically just a line of ants crawling across my face, but otherwise nothing. I've been using this castor oil for a few monthd and I've seen significant growth. It's kind of amazing! I put some on my finger and rub it together to get it warm, and then spread it on my brow bone. I've been doing this almost every night and while it's a slow process, I have seen growth and I'm very happy with it. Something is better than nothing!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nature’s oil
customer_reviews.text: I use it from head to toe! What a difference natural products can make. I drench my hair in it at night before I get a shower and it makes such a huge difference. I also add some to the palm of my hand while adding my regular lotion and rub it into my body it’s doing wonders for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: JessKel

customer_reviews.title: Not hexane free
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular castor oil as it was suppose to be hexane free, as was stated in the description. Unfortunately it wasn't labeled as such, and I am not able to use it for the purpose intended. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Lavonda Conners

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market for hair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I have done several things over the years in order to produce some hair growth, but this right here is the only thing that has worked. If you are looking for something that you are going to believe will you give unrealistic result, then don't purchase this. This is a product that will give you real results over a period of time, especially if you suffer from alopecia areata.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Haddon

customer_reviews.title: My eyelids are on fire...
customer_reviews.text: Do not, for the love of GOD, put this on your eyebrows or eyelashes. My skin is so raw and itchy like this burned the area from irritation. I’ve used castor oil before but never this brand and i used it today to start treating post partum hair loss and figured why not use it on my eyebrows And eyelashes like i have before ( used to remove eye makeup with castor oil before) I’m left with these itchyyyy painful eyelids. Update: after a restless and painful night of burning eyelids i wake up to swollen eyes, look at images above. Guess not all castor oil is created equal....ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R

customer_reviews.title: What's Good About Castor Oil?
customer_reviews.text: This oil is not like the castor oil not used since childhood with that overbearing smell and taste. The consistency or texture is a lil overbearing with its kind of thickly, gluey like feel. However, once applied to the skin it gives the skin a radiant appearance that's appealing. The skin looks healthy, evenly hydrated and moisturized. The sticky, gluey like feel when applying is a negative distraction. The end results may be positive, but getting there has a kind of awkward feel and appeal although it clearly healed the worse outbreak of hives I think I've ever had. That was amazing! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love this castor oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this castor oil! It has so many great uses my list could go on and on. It takes care of my daughters acne, replaced my face moisurizer (good for aging skin), general aches and pains (I put it on at night and wake up w less pain), rashes, sunburns (soothes skin better than aloe), faster healing of scrapes and most skin ailments.........and more.
customer_reviews.author: awesomeness

customer_reviews.title: Best organic castor oil you can find.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the very good quality castor oils I have used. And I am an Indian and castor oil is a household item in our pantries ever since we were kids. This is organic too and for the price, nothing beats this. The consistency is thick and it is greasy but that’s how it is supposed to be. I use it to oil my hair a few minutes before shower and I sometimes apply it to my face or any dry body parts before bath. I also use it for a lot of DIY masks or home remedies. I would recommend this to anyone and I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vamsi

customer_reviews.title: I think I found the one!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this company. I've purchased a few castor oils (and shea butter) from other companies and the quality of the products is not the same. This castor oil exceeds my expectations. Once I applied it on my skin, I immediately could see the difference compared to other castor oils that I've used. It does not have a heavy scent and it leaves your skin feeling soft and well nourished. This is the only brand that I will use.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Great for healing skin
customer_reviews.text: The packaging arrived neatly and the bottle was wrapped in plastic to avoid spills. I've always been an avid user of coconut oil, but this time of year, my skin began flaring up and coconut oil was too light to soothe my skin. I'd say this castor oil is the consistency of honey without all the stickiness. It has a very faint smell that's not very noticeable or bad and dissipates after the oil is absorbed. It's great for healing rough skin or soothing skin altogether and creates a noticeable difference after applying. I've added this to my skincare regimen and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Kimszal

customer_reviews.title: Helps my psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve suspected that I’ve been losing hair for awhile. I’m pushing thirty and decided to do something about it. I happen to have dandruff and psoriasis on my scalp which may be the cause of my possibly thinning hair. I have used this three times in the past week and my dandruff and psoriasis is basically gone! I can hardly believe it! Every other night I put the oil in my hair and wear a bonnet that I also purchased from Amazon. I went from using dandruff shampoos every time I shower to being able to actually use good smelling, regular shampoos. I am hoping that my hair will thicken overtime now that my scalp is healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY BROWS
customer_reviews.text: I was really reckless in doing my own brows and made them way too thin. I tried to grow them out for a month before starting to use this and didn't see too much progress. I started using the oil on brows and lashes and wow this product really made a difference! I used it for about 5 weeks nightly and saw such dramatic results. My brows and lashes haven't looked this full in a long time. So grateful to this oil.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perioral Dermatis - THIS WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who struggles with perioral dermatitis knows the story and the struggle. I visited a local all natural store and the owner, who creates her own serums, told me the main ingredient in one of her products was castor oil. I asked her if I could apply it directly to my skin and whaallaa! In a bout a week, it was almost gone. I applied it DAILY at night, and even under my makeup sometimes and it worked. I also took zinc and sulfur supplements, but I know this worked. It's a heavy oil. but worth it! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: UnhappyMama

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to distribute through hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awful! It’s like trying to spread syrup on your hair. I honestly haven’t seen any benefits from it probably because it was so hard to distribute through my hair. And yes I diluted with coconut oil. Still awful
customer_reviews.author: Averie

product_meta.title: Castor Oil USDA Organic Cold-Pressed (16oz) 100% Pure Hexane-Free Castor Oil - Conditioning & Healing, For Dry Skin, Hair Growth - For Skin, Hair Care, Eyelashes - Caster Oil By Sky Organics
feature_bullets: Contains: 1 x 16 oz. bottle of USDA Organic, cold-pressed, 100% pure Castor Oil by Sky Organics.
100% Pure and Cold-pressed: Sky Organics 100% pure, unrefined Castor Oil contains no added ingredients, fragrance, alcohols, or preservatives.
Conditioning Oil for All Hair Types: Organic Castor Oil is a natural source of fatty acids that nourish and moisturize the scalp and support healthy hair.
Conditions Lashes and Brows: Support beautiful, fuller looking lashes and brows by using Organic Castor Oil as a natural eyelash and eyebrow serum.
Responsibly Made: Our Organic Castor Oil is responsibly sourced, USDA certified Organic, and 100% vegan and cruelty-free.
